about.text: Akronix is a crypto gaming universe built on the play-to-earn principle. Akronix contains many games of different genres, connected by one plot
about.text-quote: Jedi and Sith, republics and empires in various game variations and plots will become a passion for a wide range of audiences, from avid gamers to those who like to spend their free time playing their favorite games

ton.title: based on the TON
ton.paragraph: The 3 main currencies of the project:

text.first: unite different audiences and introduce people who are just coming to cryptocurrency to web3 gaming
text.second: For correct work with the blockchain, we recommend using the Tonkeeper wallet

cards.title: credits
cards.text: in-game currency, earn in games and use for upgrades and exchange

cards.title: akron coin
cards.text: native token of the Akronix platform, providing a variety of functions and features and used for all internal transactions on the platform.

cards.title: ton coin
cards.text: utility token used to purchase NFTs

nft.text: list of NFT characters currently available for purchase

banner.title: Improve your equipment, upgrade your weapons and earn more credits
banner.text: Play, engage in battles with Vader himself, prove yourself a master of space battles and earn money with AKRONIX

slides.text: Become a star fleet commander and fight other players, use your tactical skills in exciting space battles!
Challenge the darkest lord. Arm yourself with blasters and have an epic battle, show your skills and prove that darkness is not omnipotent!
Lead your team of heroes and show your tactical mastery in exciting MOBA battles, where every decision brings you closer to victory!
Challenge the darkest lord. Arm yourself with blasters and have an epic battle, show your skills and prove that darkness is not omnipotent!

games.title: game integration with unity
games.text: Thanks to the capabilities of the unity engine, we were able to integrate all the advantages of 3D visualization, the beauty of graphics and features of the Gameplay and all 3D features into Acronix and made it possible to launch cool 3D games directly from Telegram

reference.text: On Akronix, you can invite your friends and get rewards for it!
reference.text-quote: Jedi and Sith, republics and empires in various game variations and plots will become a passion for a wide range of audiences, from avid gamers to those who like to spend their free time playing their favorite games

text.first: Clans are an important and exciting aspect of the Akronix cryptocurrency gaming platform
text.second: Clans offer players the opportunity to band together, create communities, and work together to achieve gameplay goals. Clans in Akronix add additional depth to gameplay by providing team battles, shared missions, and unique clan bonuses.

token.text: Akron on the TON network provides many functions and features and is used for all internal transactions on the akronix gaming platform
token.text-quote: With its unique characteristics and advantages, AKRON contributes to the development of a decentralized gaming ecosystem, making it more innovative, secure and economically sustainable. The liquidity and popularity of the token is further supported by the interest and turnover of funds within all products of the Arkonix ecosystem.

cards.title: Safety and speed
cards.text: The decentralized TON Network ensures high transaction speed and token security, making AKRON fast and reliable to use.

cards.title: Low fees
cards.text: Transactions on the TON network have low fees, allowing users to effectively use the AKRON token for small and frequent transactions.

cards.title: Integration with projects
cards.text: AKRON can be easily integrated with other projects and platforms running on the TON network, expanding its functionality and applicability.

cards.title: ecosystem development
cards.text: Active use of AKRON contributes to the growth and development of the Akronix gaming platform, attracting new users and developers

form.text: For correct work with the blockchain, we recommend using the Tonkeeper wallet

presale.title: Don't miss the akron token presale!
presale.text: The Akron token presale is a unique opportunity for investors of all levels to enter the Akronix ecosystem at the start. The Play-to-Earn platform with high growth potential is open to anyone who wants to be part of the future of decentralized gaming

whitepaper.title: Check out our official white paper
whitepaper.text: pdf file contains more detailed information about the akronix platform, token and functionality
